properties.name: yyspring.apollo.app.id
properties.description: Apollo 配置中心 APPID，默认是项目代号ProjectNo.

properties.name: yyspring.apollo.meta
properties.description: 默认是 apollo-env.properties 中的不同环境值.

properties.name: yyspring.alarm.log-error-enabled
properties.description: log.error() 是否使用告警用的Appender，默认是.

properties.name: yyspring.swagger2.enabled
properties.description: 是否启用Swagger2，默认是启用的.

properties.name: yyspring.thrift.exporter.type
properties.description: Thrift Export Type, Default is null.
